arabicText: وَعَلَّمَ ءَادَمَ ٱلْأَسْمَآءَ كُلَّهَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُمْ عَلَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ فَقَالَ أَنۢبِـُٔونِى بِأَسْمَآءِ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	Allah the	Supreme	 taught	Adam	all	
the	 names	 (of	 things),	 then	 presented	
them	 to	 the	angels,	saying,	 “Tell	Me	 the	
names	of	these,	if	you	are	truthful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 Allah	 ta'ala	 ne	 Ādam ko	 tamām	
ashya	 ke	 nām	 sikhaye	 phir	 sab	 Ashiya'		
Malaika	per	pesh	karke	farmāya	sachche	
ho	to	inke	nām	to	batau

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ لَا عِلْمَ لَنَآ إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمْتَنَآ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
They	 said,	 “Purity	is	 to	 You!	We	 do	 not	
have	 any	 knowledge	 except	 what	 You	
have	taught	us!	Indeed	You	only	are	the	
All	Knowing,	the	Wise.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	pāki	hai	tujhe	hameiñ	kuch	ilm	nhi	
magar	jitna	 tu	 ne	 hame	 sikhaya	 beshak	
tu hi	Ilm-o-hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ لَا عِلْمَ لَنَآ إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمْتَنَآ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said	 “O	 Adam!	 Inform	 them	 the	
names”;	 and	 when	 Adam	 had	 informed	
them	their	names,	He	said,	“Did	I	not	tell	
you	 that	 I	 know	 all	 the	 secrets	 of	 the	
heavens	 and	 the	 earth?	 And	 I	 know	 all	
what	 you	 disclose	 and	 all	 what	 you	
hide?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Farmāya	 aey	 Ādam!	 Batā	 de	 inheñ	 sab	
ashy’a	 ke	 nām jab	 Ādam ne	 unheñ	 sab	
ke	 nām	 batā	 diye	 farmaya,	 "maiñ	 na	
kahta	 tha	 ke	 main	 jānta	 huñ	 āsmanoñ	
aur	 zameen	 ki	 sab	 chupi	 cheezeñ	 aur	
maiñ	jānta	huñ	jo	 kuch	 tum	zahir	 karte	
aur	jo	kuch	tum	chupate	ho."

arabicText: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	(remember)	 when	 We	 ordered	 the	
angels	to	prostrate	before	Adam,	so	they	
all	 prostrated,	 except	 Iblis	 (Satan	 -
devil);	 he	 refused	 and	 was	 proud	- and	
became	a	disbeliever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 yād	 karo	 jab	 ham	 ne	 Farishtoñ	 ko	
hukm	 diya	 ke	 Ādam ko	 sajdah	 karo	 to	
sab	 ne	 sajdah	 kiya	 siwāye	 Iblees	 ke,	
munkir	huwa	aur	ghuroor	kiya	aur	kafir	
ho	gaya

arabicText: وَقُلْنَا يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ ٱسْكُنْ أَنتَ وَزَوْجُكَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَكُلَا مِنْهَا رَغَدًا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَـٰذِهِ ٱلشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. And	We	said,	“O	Adam!	You	and	your	wife	dwell	in	this	Garden,	and	eat	freely	from	it	wherever	
you	please	- but	do	not	approach	this	tree	for	you	will	become	of	those	who	transgress.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ham	ne	farmāya	aey	Ādam!	Tu	aur	teri	biwi	is	Jannat	meiñ	raho	aur khao	is	meiñ	se	be	rok	
tok	jahān	tumhāra	ji	chāhe	magar	us	perd	ke	pās	na	jāna	ke	had	se	badhne	waloñ	meiñ	ho	jaog

arabicText: فَأَزَلَّهُمَا ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ عَنْهَا فَأَخْرَجَهُمَا مِمَّا كَانَا فِيهِ ۖ وَقُلْنَا ٱهْبِطُوا۟ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّۭ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّۭ وَمَتَـٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
. So	 the	devil	caused	 them	 to	stumble	in	it	and	removed	 them	 from	where	 they	were	- and	We	
said,	“Go	down,	one	of	you	is	an	enemy	to	the	other;	and	for	a	fixed	time	you	shall	stay	on	earth	
and	feed	in	it.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. To	shaitān	ne	Jannat	se	unheiñ	laghzish	di	aur	jahāñ	rahte	the	wahāñ	se	unheñ	alag	kar	diya	aur	
ham	ne	 farmaya	neeche	utro	āpas	meiñ	ek	tumhāra	doosre	ka	dushman	aur	 tumheiñ	ek	waqt	
tak	zameen	meiñ	thaherna	aur	baratna	hai

arabicText: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَـٰتٍۢ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 Adam	 learnt	 from	 his	 Lord	 certain	 words	(of	 revelation),	 therefore	 Allah accepted	 his	
repentance;	indeed	He	only	is	the	Most	Acceptor	of	Repentance,	the	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Phir	seekh	liye	Ādam ne	apne	Rab	ke	kuch	kalme	to	Allah	ne	uski	tauba	qabool	ki	beshak	wohi	
bahot	tauba	qabool	karne	wāla	maherbān

arabicText: قُلْنَا ٱهْبِطُوا۟ مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۭا ۖ فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّى هُدًۭى فَمَن تَبِعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hum	ne	 farmaya	 tum	sab	 Jannat	se	utar	jao	
phir	 agar	 tumhāre	 pās	 meri	 taraf	 se	 koi	
hidāyat	 āaye	 to	 jo	 meri	 hidayat	 ka	 pairu	
huwa	usey	na	koi	andesha	na	kuch	gham

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. And	 those	 who	 disbelieve	 and	 deny	 Our	
signs,	 are	 the	 people	 of	 fire	 (hell);	 they	
will	remain	in	it	forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 woh	 jo	 kufr	 kareiñ	 aur	 meri	 Āyateiñ
jhutlayeñ	 ge	 woh	 dozakh	 wāle	 haiñ	 unko	
hamesha	us	meiñ	rahna

arabicText: يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتِىَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَوْفُوا۟ بِعَهْدِىٓ أُوفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْ وَإِيَّـٰىَ فَٱرْهَبُونِ
englishTranslationText:
O	 Descendants	 of	 Israel	 (Jacob)!	
Remember	 My	 favour	 which	 I	 bestowed	
upon	 you,	 and	 fulfil	 your	 covenant	
towards	 Me,	 I	 shall	 fulfil	 My	 covenant	
towards	you;	and	fear	Me	alone.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Ya‘qūb ki	 aulād,	 "yād	 karo	 mera	 woh	
ehsān	 jo	 maiñ ne	 tum	 per	 kiya	 aur	 mera	
‘ahed	poora	karo	maiñ tumhara	‘ahed	poora	
karuñga	aur	khās	mera	hi	dar	rakho."

arabicText: وَءَامِنُوا۟ بِمَآ أَنزَلْتُ مُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا مَعَكُمْ وَلَا تَكُونُوٓا۟ أَوَّلَ كَافِرٍۭ بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَا تَشْتَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِى ثَمَنًۭا قَلِيلًۭا وَإِيَّـٰىَ فَٱتَّقُونِ
englishTranslationText:
And	accept	faith	in	what	I	have	sent	down	
(the	Qur’an),	which	confirms	what	is	with	
you	(the	Torah	/	Bible),	and	do	not	be	the	
first	 to	 disbelieve	 in	 it	 - and	 do	 not	
exchange	 My	 verses	 for	 an	 abject	 - and	
fear	Me	alone.
romanUrduTranslationText:
vAur	 Īmān	lāo	us	per	jo	Maine	ne	 utāra	 uski	
tasdeeq	 karta	 hua	 jo	 tumhāre	 sāth	 hai	 a
sab	se	pahle	uske	munkir	na	bano	aur	meri	
Āyatoñ ke	badle	 thode	dām	na	lo	aur	mujhi	
se	daro

arabicText: وَلَا تَلْبِسُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ وَتَكْتُمُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 do	 not	mix	 the	 truth	with	 falsehood,	
nor	purposely	conceal	the	truth.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	 haq	 se	 bātil	 ko	 na	 milao	 aur	 deeda-odānista	haq	na	chupao

arabicText: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرْكَعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 keep	 the	 (obligatory) prayer	
established,	 and	 pay	 the	 charity,	 and	 bow	
your	 heads	 with	 those	 who	 bow	 (in	
prayer).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Namāz	 qāyem	 rakho	 aur	 Zakāt	 do	 aur	
ruku’	karne	walon	ke	sāth	ruku	karo

arabicText: أَتَأْمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلْبِرِّ وَتَنسَوْنَ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ تَتْلُونَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. What!	 You	 enjoin	 righteousness	 upon	
people	 while	 you	 forget	 (to	 practise	 it)	
yourselves,	 whereas	 you	 read	 the	 Book?	
Do	you	not	have	sense?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	 logoñ	 ko	 bhalāi	 ka	 hukm dete	 ho	 aur	
apni	jānoñ	ko	bhoolte	ho	halānke	tum	Kitāb	
pardhte	ho	to	kya	tumheiñ	aql	nahi

arabicText: وَٱسْتَعِينُوا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلْخَـٰشِعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	seek	help	in	patience	and	prayer;	and	truly	it	is	hard	except	for	those	who	prostrate	before	
Me	with	sincerity.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Sabr	 aur	 Namāz	 se	 madad	 chāho	 aur	
beshak	Namāz	zaroor	bhāri	hai	magar	un	per	
Jo	dil	se	meri	taraf	jhukte	haiñ

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَـٰقُوا۟ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِ رَٰجِعُونَ
englishTranslationText: Who	know	that	they	have	to	meet	their	Lord,	and	that	it	is	to	Him	they	are	to	return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jinheñ	 yaqeen	 hai	 ke	 unheiñ	 apne	 Rab	 se	
milna	hai	aur	usi	ki	taraf	phirna

arabicText: يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتِىَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَنِّى فَضَّلْتُكُمْ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	Descendants	of	 Israel!	Remember	 the	 favour	of	Mine,	which	 I	bestowed	upon	you	and	gave	
you	superiority	over	others	of	your	time.	(by	sending	the	Noble	Messengers	to	your	nation)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aey	aulād-e-Ya‘qūb!	Yād	karo	mera	woh	ehsān	jo	maiñ	ne	tum	per	kiya	aur	yeh	ke	us	sāre	zamāne	per	
tumheiñ	badāi	d

arabicText: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ يَوْمًۭا لَّا تَجْزِى نَفْسٌ عَن نَّفْسٍۢ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يُقْبَلُ مِنْهَا شَفَـٰعَةٌۭ وَلَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنْهَا عَدْلٌۭ وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. And	 fear	 the	Day	 (of	Resurrection)	when	no	 soul	will	 be	exchanged	 for	another,	nor	will	any	
intercession	be	accepted	 for	the	disbelievers,	nor	will	they	be	set	 free	in	lieu	of	compensation	
nor	will	they	be	helped.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	daro	us	din	se	jis	din	koi	Jān	doosre	ka	badla	na	ho	sake	gi	aur	na	kāfir	ke	liye	koi	sifarish	māni	jāye	
aur	na	kuch	leker	uski	jān	chhodi	jāye	aur	na	unki	madad	ho
